components.name: Environment Variables
components.description: Stores configuration settings such as database and Redis URLs securely.

components.name: Scheduler Manager
components.description: Core component that initializes APScheduler, registers tasks, and manages their execution.

components.name: Database (PostgreSQL)
components.description: Persistent storage for schedules and job history, ensuring data reliability.

components.name: Task Queue (Redis)
components.description: Manages task queuing and caching to optimize task execution.

components.name: Task Workers
components.description: Execute specific tasks such as cache management and LLM provider synchronization.

data_flows.description: Configuration settings are loaded to initialize the scheduler.
Scheduled tasks and job states are persisted in the database.
Tasks are queued for execution based on their schedules.
Task Workers retrieve and execute tasks from the queue.

trust_boundaries.name: Database Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Separation between application logic and data storage to protect sensitive information.

trust_boundaries.name: Task Execution Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary between task queuing and execution to ensure task integrity.
